About Me

I'm passionate about bringing ideas to life, solving complex problems and turning them into simple solutions.

When I write code for a project, I pay attention to making it clean, maintainable, and understandable to me and to other developers.

As this sector is constantly evolving, it is interesting and challenging for me to work as a web developer and be up to date with new technologies.

Interest

When I'm not coding, I enjoy spending time outdoors biking, especially in warmer weather, and on cooler days I'm in the gym lifting weights. I have a great passion for road cycling and exploring the countryside.

I also read self-improvement books and meditate daily. These simple yet beneficial habits in my daily routine make my day better and more productive.
